name: Cosplay Amino
description: Cosplay Amino is the fastest growing mobile social network for cosplayers and cosplay enthusiasts!  - Build a profile showing your passion for cosplay - Connect with other cosplayers around the world on topics from otaku to chibi and masquerades to fanservice - Discuss your favorite cosplayers, competitions, and cosplay - Gain a massive following by sharing your thoughts, finds, and creations - Discover other members cosplay, projects, and tutorials  In Cosplay Amino, you can:  - Create polls and discussions to share with other cosplay fans - Show off your latest finds and projects - Share, discuss, and debate technique - Obsess over the latest cosplay news, conventions, competitions, or contests - Connect with local cosplayers and cosplay fans  Discover other cosplay fans nearby and around the world who share your passion for cosplay, crossplay, LARPing, glomping, and conventions, anime, manage, and otaku. Post and chat about materials, projects, tutorials, and news. Ask and answer questions on the fly and search for expert answers on everything cosplay.  Come find us on the web: http://www.aminoapps.com/
